Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Review all implemented systems (health, stamina, UI, sound effects). Identify any areas that need improvement or further polish.
Conduct playtesting with the integrated resource system. Gather feedback on the feel of the game. Analyze whether the resource system enhances the gameplay experience.
Address any critical bugs or issues identified during playtesting. Prioritize fixing problems that significantly impact gameplay. Refactor code for better clarity.
Refine the resource system based on playtesting feedback. Adjust stamina costs, regeneration rates, and other parameters. Improve the UI for better readability.
Final review of all code and documentation. Ensure that everything is well-organized and easy to understand. Remove unnecessary comments or code.
Write release notes summarizing the work completed this week. Describe the implemented features, bug fixes, and improvements.
Perform final testing to ensure that the release is stable and ready to be deployed. Fix any last-minute bugs or issues.
Prepare the release for deployment. Package the code and assets into a deployable format. Submit the release for approval.
